archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.2.2: Information security responsibilities for all employees throughout the organisation should be specified in terms and conditions of employment (e.g. in a contract, employee handbook or code of conduct), performance objectives and job descriptions.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
